data.text: Zunui nii maanɛai ga zelii lo ma, é ɗa ɠɔgi ɓaa ga,
Telebo nuiti ta mɔinna, nuɓusɛiti koozu ɠa ɗa nɛ,
Zɔi é pɔ ga é ziɛ ga ɠimalai, naa ɠa ɗa kɛɛɠɛ ɠoozunɛ,
Masagi ɠa ɗa ná-zooi ɓɛtɛ, siɛgi zu é ziɛzu la ga telebodai,
Nui é bɔɔlaiti tɛɛzu su,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta ɗa ɠɛ ga kasoɠa nui, tiya ɓɔɠɔi ta-lɔ koloɠologiti faa zu,
Telebo nui naa ɠwɛɛ, nii maanɛai é ɠɛ bala nuiti bɛ,
Ɲɛɛɠulasu nuiti ta ɗa kpɔɛ abui ʋili taa wolai zu,
Ni ɠima nui ta ɠimalala nui ta ɠɛna tukpɔi ma,
Ɲama ʋuu nuiti ta ɗa telebo nui wɔinzeɠe,
Ɠimalala nui ɠa ɗa ná-ziiɠaawana vaiti kpein kula kɛlɛma,
Siɛgi zu kundiɠii woilosu da zɛɛ ɓɔɛiti ma,
Bala nui ta maanɔɠɔ nui, ti ɓɔgɛ faa ɠila ma:
Masagi nii é zobobɛlala nuiti ta-lukpɔi ɠaaleʋezu ga gaamai,
Kpakɔi ta zelilomai, ta ɗa ɠimalai ve,
Siɛgi zu nu ɲɔiti ti mɔinzu la, tɔ koloɠologi zu ɠa ɗa wɔɔlɔ,
Ni ɗa è-loun zunui maaɠolona, é la è yiizoolɛ vaa ɠɛa,
Siɛgi zu GALA ge la kulakɛlɛma wosu da, nuɓusɛiti ta ɗa eteai ziɛ faazupui zu.
Nu la ɗa ga botiɠɛ nui maaɠolo ga kpɔɛzuɠulai,
Ɗa nu ɠaana, é ɗa ɓɔɛ, é la ɠigaiziɛzu,
Ni nu a botiɠɛ nui laanɛɛna ná-nu niinɛlai zu,
Ziiɠula nui ɠa ɗa kpɔɛi leʋe,
Wasogi ɠa ɗa nui maayei,
Zɔi é yeezeizu unma nui wu, naa ɠa ɗa ɓɔɠɔ nimiza,
Ɗa ɠɛna lua nuiti ba, toɠa ga balii,
Ma mɔinmɔin ka ná, ti ɗa kpɔbai ɠaiziɛ ta-ɠundiɠii ya,29:26 ti ɗa kpɔbai ɠaiziɛ ta-ɠundiɠii ya: Tati pelei taɠiligaa ɓalaa ka ga niiti: ti pɔ ga totuɠɔi ti-wooi mɛni ɓaa totuɠɔi yeezei ti wu
Telebotala nuiti wɔin ɠa ɗa zeɠe telebo nuiti ma,
